title2: I'm Saleh. I build things for the web
title3: Hi ðŸ‘‹ I'm Saleh. I build things for the web
p1: I was born and raised in Saudi Arabia. I live in my favourite place on earth ðŸ—½NYCðŸ—½. I work with the most amazing team ever @Shopify as a software engineer. I really enjoy computering and the prospects of positive change that are possible with the advancement of technology to make the world a better, more just place
p2: Besides work, I enjoy the company of good people and friends. I'm lucky to have a strong community of wonderful people that make New York feel like a small town :)
p3: I spend a lot of time around books/music/films as well as being out in nature. The highest I've climbed is ~6,000 meters and the lowest is probably a few 100 meters below surface (hoping to go deeper soon!!)
p4: The vast majority of my worldviews and personality come from travelling. I'm like that person with an accent and look you can't place but like in ~7 languages
p5: I don't use social media, but woule love to connect over email, my email is saleh@alghusson.com
